operational.name: Channels REST API
operational.description: The API your servers use to publish messages and query channel state, described here: https://pusher.com/docs/rest_api

operational.name: Channels WebSocket client API
operational.description: The API which Pusher Channels end-users connect to, generally for subscribing to events

operational.name: Channels Dashboard
operational.description: dashboard.pusher.com: Where you can view statistics and manage your apps.

operational.name: Channels Stats Integrations
operational.description: Integration of Pusher Channels with Datadog and other 3rd party providers

operational.name: Channels Pusher.js CDN
operational.description: The CDN backing js.pusher.com, serving the javascript client library to end users.

operational.name: Payment API
operational.description: The API that handle charging, plan upgrade, downgrade and cancellation
